resources.string: Welcome to Husky Haze, your personalized weather and news companion designed specifically for the University of Washington community.
Explore our codebase and contribute to the development of Husky Haze on GitHub: HuskyHaze Repository

Husky Haze is more than just a weather app; it is a comprehensive tool designed to empower UW students with timely information. Our mission is to provide students with easy access to both weather forecasts and relevant news updates, all within one convenient platform.
Whether you are planning your day on campus or preparing for a weekend getaway, Husky Haze ensures you\'re always informed and ready for whatever lies ahead.
Stay tuned for updates and new features as we continue to enhance the Husky Haze experience for our fellow UW Huskies!
